name: Cambodian Straight with Closure
description:
This hair is 100% VIRGIN REMY HAIR ! It is bouncy, soft & SHED FREE! Can be straightened or curled, dyed or bleached. Its simply luxurious!
Comes with 3 (100 g/3.5 oz) bundles & Hand Tied Closure!
No One Will Beat This Offer!
.Hair type - 100% Virgin Human Hair

·Color - Natural Brown/Black

·Texture - Soft

·Weft – Machine weft

·Approx. Weight - 3.5 oz

.Luster - Low to Medium
